content: 2024 harry potter inspired advent socks each day starting december 1st a clue/prompt will be released in the slytherin sock syndicate thread 1 and on the blog 2 starting with 24 row on the first day of december we will be counting down the days to 1 row on christmas eve do not use the two at a time method instead please use two sets of needles you ll be working on the socks on alternate days for example day 1 on sock a day 2 on sock b the socks can be worked either toe up or cuff down depending on personal preference instructions are given for both you will need 8-10 grams of yarn for the largest stripe if you are doing a large colourwork section you will need 8-10 grams of each colour we will add a pdf with all the clues here in the new year for more information see https //slytherinsocks blogspot com/ 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/the-snake-pit/4292474/1-25 2 https //slytherinsocks blogspot com/
